hints.content:
Mom had $\goldE{19}$ pennies.

![A number line starts at 19 and extends to the right.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/04a36fde7fe12ee2c83c7e0b163190baf06c3d65)

To add on the number line, we jump to the **right**.

Then she found $\maroonD{23}$ pennies in the couch. 

![A number line starts at 19 with plus 23 and goes to 42. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/983a9f63592c47d650dca84bf9f7977b7e449789)

$\goldE{19} + \maroonD{23}= 42$

Mom found $\blueE{31}$ pennies in the car.

![A number line starts at 19 with plus 23 and goes to 42. From 42 plus 31 goes to 73. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/adb0d67303b56530cd2b54201991c3dbadcbe6ad)

$42+  \blueE{31} = 73$

Then Mom found $\purpleD{15}$ pennies under the rug. 

![A number line starts at 19 with plus 23 and goes to 42. From 42 plus 31 goes to 73. From 73 plus 15 goes to 88.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/26db789d9b3aee899390ca943dae8e3f1cd95b02)

$73+\purpleD{15} = 88$

This number line represents how to find the total pennies Mom has now:

![A number line starts at 19 with plus 23 and goes to 42. From 42 plus 31 goes to 73. From 73 plus 15 goes to  ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/f0b46dff3dbfdcb7fbcac773562176d85e21131e)

Mom has $88$ pennies.

question.content:
Mom had $19$ pennies.   

Then, Mom found $23$ more pennies in the couch, $31$ more pennies in the car, and $15$ more pennies under the rug.    

**Which number line shows how to find how many total pennies Mom has now?**

[[☃ radio 1]]


**How many pennies does Mom have now?**  

[[☃ numeric-input 1]] pennies

choices.content: ![A number line starts at 0 with plus 23 and goes to 23. From 23 plus 31 goes to 54. From 54 plus 15 goes to  ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/fb0974f4c61cce8fd4615f105dc5277f06bd9d73)

![A number line starts at 19 with plus 23 and goes to 42. From 42 plus 31 goes to 73. From 73 plus 15 goes to  ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/f0b46dff3dbfdcb7fbcac773562176d85e21131e)
